attributes.action: accept de-selection of all MP's who voted against an EU Referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every political party voted for a referendum on the EU and now we have the  sick spectacle of the Government and a large majority of MP's who have reneged on that promise. This shows a complete lack of scruples and I call upon the Prime Minister to accept that any MP who voted against a referendum this week should be de-selected by every political party as not being a fit and proper person to lead the country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
